headline: Japan’s U.S. Investment Push Focuses on Nuclear Power
summary: Japan and the U.S. revealed some details of who could benefit from Tokyo's pledge to invest $550 billion in the U.S. as part of the countries’ trade deal. Topping the list: nuclear power. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick on Monday outlined a string of investment plans at a ceremony in Tokyo.

headline: Tariff Impact Mixed, Mostly Moderate, So Far In Q3 Earnings
summary: Investors are no longer giving companies a free pass on guidance for tariffs, as they had in earlier earnings seasons.

headline: Valaris Limited (VAL) Gained Over 17% This Week. Here is Why.
summary: The share price of Valaris Limited (NYSE:VAL) surged by 17.28% between October 17 and October 24, 2025, putting it among the Energy Stocks that Gained the Most This Week. Valaris Limited (NYSE:VAL), together with its subsidiaries, provides offshore contract drilling services in Brazil, the United Kingdom, the US Gulf of Mexico, Australia, Angola, and internationally.
